article_title: Obama Is A Failed Manager. Or Is He?

article_metadata.description: Edward Kosner called President Obama a "failed manager" in The Wall Street Journal. Really? Obama is the only president in history to inherit 2 shooting wars AND a deep recession and he's managed to wind down the wars and pass a health care bill after 3 other presidents tried and failed at the same thing. That's failure?
article_metadata.author: Geoff Loftus
